response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,000,000, and I believe we can bridge the gap with a fair transaction. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $950,000. This price not only reflects the value I place on the product but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for me. I am confident that this offer presents a mutually beneficial solution. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction with you soon. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
